MP Mike Crockart has said he is`` confident'' the UK Government's proposed Green Investment Bank will be located in Edinburgh. He acknowledged there would be competition from other cities but claimed the Capital was winning the argument so far . He spoke out after UK Energy Secretary Chris Huhne said the city had a`` substantial advantage'' because of the expertise its financial institutions had in lending to renewable energy firms. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly,'' Larry Page said. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said.`` You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.''

bid to take the crown in the talent show's seventh season. Despite rocker David Archuleta Cook's surge in recent weeks, the judges were uncharacteristically united in proclaiming early fan favorite teen David Archuleta had outperformed his rival. You came out here tonight to win, and what we have witnessed is a knockout, said prickly judge Simon Cowell .
